description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Crossfire 2 is the sequel to the "Best Arcade Shooter of 2010".  All new mega-enemies, a massive upgrade system, multiple difficulty levels, and online scoreboards make Crossfire 2 even more amazing than the original.  NOTE: Online scoreboards require an Xbox Live Gold account.  Crossfire 2 is the sixth game in the highly-rated Radiangames series.
